metadata.title: CVE-2020-8264 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In actionpack gem >= 6.0.0, a possible XSS vulnerability exists when anapplication is running in development mode allowing an attacker to send orembed (in another page) a specially crafted URL which can allow theattacker to execute JavaScript in the context of the local application.This vulnerability is in the Actionable Exceptions middleware.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
